resources.string: Which of the following characteristics define(s) Android?
It is a Linux kernel-based system used on Smart watches, LEDs, etc.
It is a closed-source Operating System used on Mobiles, Tablets, etc.
It is a stack of software for Mobile devices which includes an Operating System, middleware, and some key applications.
All of the following are core building blocks of Android except?
What is the full meaning of APK?
DP is based on physical density of the screen while SP is also scaled by user\'s font size.
SP is based on physical density of the screen while DP is also scaled by user\'s font size.
Which of these is/are View Groups?
What are the full meaning of DP and SP respectively?
What do you understand by Manifest file?
It is the file that provides essentials information about your app to the Android system
It is the file that provides an interface for users to interact with the application
It is the messaging object that is used for communication between the Android components
The toolset which includes source codes, libraries, emulators and development tools for building Android application is
It is the file that provides essentials information about your app to the Android system
It is the file that provides an interface for users to interact with the application
It is the messaging object that is used for communication between the Android components
Java Deployment Kit; Software Deployment Kit
Java Desktop Kit; Software Desktop Kit
Java Development Kit; Software Development Kit
